attributes.action: Reduce the Speed Limit on the A16 in Utterby, Lincolnshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In late February this year a young school girls life was tragicly cut short after stepping from her school bus. The 15 year old was killed on the A16 in Utterby Lincolnshire by a car been driven at 50mph, the speed limit for the A16.
This petitions is designed to get the A16's speed limit reduced to 30mph to stop a tradgedy like this happening again.
Please sign this petition.
